name: European Society for Organ Transplantation
goal: ESOT provides the environment, knowledge and resources to encourage professional development of researchers and healthcare professionals in the field of organ transplantation, replacement and regeneration.
interests: Education and training, Public Health, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
Improving INtegrated people-centered Health Care Solutions (INCASO)

Improving Organ Donation and Transplantation in the EU
